tool_description: Combines multiple musical elements (melody, bass, chords) into a complete MIDI sequence with proper timing and channel assignments.

melody_timing.description: Array of melody note start times

bass_timing.description: Array of bass note start times

total_bars.description: Total number of bars in sequence (1-64)

error_messages: Mismatched timing arrays: Each note array must have corresponding timing array of same length
Invalid tempo: Must be between 60-200 BPM
Invalid time signature format: Use format like 4/4 or 3/4
Invalid bar count: Must be between 1-64 bars
Empty sequence: Provide at least one musical element (melody, bass, or chords)
usage: Provide musical elements with timing arrays, tempo, time signature, and total bars. Optionally set quantization. Returns complete MIDI sequence data.

midi_events.description: MIDI event data in chronological order

track_assignments.description: MIDI track assignments for each part
